item.title: How to build a github page with hugo
item.description: This article will talk about how to use hugo, Github Pages and Github Actions to build a blog. Hugo Installation First of all, you will need to install hugo locally. I am using Linux, so the command is # Ubuntu snap install hugo Other installation detail can be found here Build Site Locally The next is to build the project and add theme ananke by hugo new site quickstart cd quickstart git submodule add https://github.
